title: Modern Super Condensed Sans Serif
content:
The following is a contemporary take on a movie poster for the classic film Metropolis. Iâ€™m trying to figure out what the title typeface is. Please help! Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [metropolis-2008.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090702234003/http:/typophile.com/files/metropolis-2008.jpg) | 121.76 KB |
author: rscurry

comments.content:
Looks like [Ohrada](http://web.archive.org/web/20090702234003/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/ohrada/).

Also look at Odeon by Jonathan Hoefler if you can find it or [Raleigh Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090702234003/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/raleigh-gothic/)
